productName: SPF 50 Face Sunscreen with Hyaluronic Acid
productShortDesc: This invisible-finish sunscreen ​provides broad spectrum UVA and UVB protection and helps prevent photoaging. Light, fluid texture. Does not leave a white cast. Enriched with hyaluronic acid and aloe vera, and formulated with mineral and organic filters. 82% naturally derived. Vegan. Made in France.

Enriched with hyaluronic acid and aloe vera, this sunscreen is both protective and hydrating for the skin.
HOW TO APPLY
Apply SPF 50 sunscreen evenly to the entire face and neck before sun exposure. Reapply every two hours in case of prolonged exposure.
As this sunscreen is not water resistant, we recommend reapplying it after swimming or sweating.
If you want to incorporate this sunscreen into your daily skin care routine, we recommend applying it after your moisturizer. It makes a good base for makeup.
IS THIS SUITABLE FOR YOUR SKIN?
This sunscreen is suitable for all skin types.
The SPF 50 protection factor offers optimal protection against sunburn and limits photoaging of the skin. We also offer an
.
PRECAUTIONS
Avoid contact with eyes. In case of contact, rinse well with water.
55% RECYCLED-PLASTIC TUBE
UVA rays penetrate deeper into the skin and are responsible for premature signs of aging. UVB mainly impacts the surface of the skin and is responsible for burns.
The use of both mineral and organic filters makes it possible to optimize effectiveness and texture. This sunscreen delivers broad spectrum protection against UVA and UVB. Its fluid and light texture, with a natural finish, is enriched with hydrating and antioxidant actives.

ETHYLHEXYL TRIAZONE: protects against UVB radiation.
